data.name: San Pedro Blinds
data.address: 3620 Roberts Cut Off Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76114

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Russ and Carol give great customer service!" "Really good service and product." "Loved this place, Mr. Russ is the best at what he does."

They seem to sell only shades—both electric and manual—so call them if you’re looking for another type of window covering. They installed my shades and Russ did a wonderful job. The shades are cut right there in the shop. The shop is worth … More
Russ and Carol give great customer service!  Love my new shades!  Russ installed them himself!  He went the extra mile making sure everything was perfect.  Highly recommend.
Excellent. Russ was very helpful on what to pick for each window. He installed them himself. He even put up the curtains and fluffed them. Russ and Carol are awesome!
